alert.note: Alert for Delta; Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued September 24 at 6:19PM CDT until September 24 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Northeastern Hunt County in north central Texas... Southwestern Delta County in north central Texas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 619 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Wolfe City, or 10 miles northwest of Commerce, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Commerce around 635 PM CDT. Klondike and Cooper Lake around 645 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Fairlie. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
